Name: Obsidian Barrier (Blast)
Desc:
[Enchant Force]
Amplifies the power of the relic to create a protective barrier. Within this barrier, you and your allies are shielded from normal enemy attacks and receive reduced damage from attacks that deal damage based on HP percentage.
Additionally, allies within the barrier can gain a critical damage increase effect when attacking enemies afflicted with the Ancient Curse debuff.
The barrier is strengthened with the power of Blast, providing protection over a wider area.
